snippet: Avery Bradley and Isaiah Thomas led the Boston Celtics to a 120-95 win at home over the struggling Nets on Friday night.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Boston Celtics defeat Brooklyn Nets, 120-95; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Avery Bradley and Isaiah Thomas led the Boston Celtics to a 120-95 win at home over the struggling Nets on Friday night.

headline.print_headline: Celtics Have Big 2nd Quarter on Way to Blowing Out Nets
headline.main: Celtics Have Big 2nd Quarter On Way to Blowing Out Nets
